column4: hi, i have a problem, my ubuntu does not recognize my wireless network card anymore... however, yesterday it still worked :S

try to reinstall the drivers, then reboot. if that does not work, do a complete removal of drivers (Including configuration files) Then do a fresh install with the latest (Stable) available driver versions
ok... but which drivers do i have to reinstall? i have a linksys network card
try looking at the manufactured web site, sometimes they have drivers for ubuntu, also try to look if the driver wasn't simply upgraded to a newer version.
